snippet.title: Ereban: Shadow Legacy - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1671360

Ereban: Shadow Legacy is a fast-paced story-driven stealth platformer game where you become Ayana, the last descendant of a forgotten race. Harness mystical shadow powers, high-tech gadgets and avoid or kill to uncover the truth about your past and the key to saving a dying, morally grey universe.

Coming to PC, Xbox Series, One and Game Pass! Date TBA.

If you want to know more, visit https://ereban.com

__________________________________________________

From indie developers Baby Robot Games.

Disclaimer: Although the video features Raw Fury as the game's publisher, this no longer applies from February 2024.

Follow us on Twitter - https://twitter.com/BabyRobotGames
Visit our website - https://ereban.com
Wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1671360
